pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Pay only for what you use. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.

payAsYouGo.name: Pay as you go
payAsYouGo.description: Pay only for what you use

features.everything: Everything in Pay as you go

pricing.oneApiDesc: Access all major AI models through a single, unified API
pricing.providersDesc: Choose from the widest selection of AI providers
pricing.usersDesc: Join millions of developers building with OpenRouter
pricing.dataPrivacyDesc: Your data is never used for training without consent
pricing.readyDesc: Start building with OpenRouter today. No credit card required.

faqItems.a1: You pay per token used. Each model has its own pricing, which you can see on the models page. There are no subscriptions or hidden fees.
faqItems.a2: Yes! We offer access to several free models with reasonable rate limits. Perfect for getting started and testing.
faqItems.a3: You can add credits at any time from your dashboard using a credit card. We also support crypto payments for larger amounts.
faqItems.a4: Enterprise includes volume discounts, SLA guarantees, dedicated support, custom integrations, and SSO/SAML authentication.
